existing_features.title: In frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx, remove the comment in lines 323-325 that mentions 'dithering на уровне материалов — правильно' which is blocking dithering changes in the Canvas gl block

In frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx, add 'dithering: true' to the gl prop object of the Canvas component (around line 310), ensuring the gl object includes: antialias: true, powerPreference: 'high-performance', alpha: false, and dithering: true

projectName: Enable dithering in Canvas and remove blocking comment
